content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_stained_glass_pane
inventory=[{"type": "crimson_door", "quantity": 57, "index": 11}, {"type": "stripped_oak_wood", "quantity": 18, "index": 13}, {"type": "pink_terracotta", "quantity": 4, "index": 14}, {"type": "lingering_potion", "quantity": 1, "index": 17}, {"type": "dark_oak_planks", "quantity": 38, "index": 20}, {"type": "anvil", "quantity": 34, "index": 21}, {"type": "blue_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 22}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 6, "index": 24}, {"type": "blue_terracotta", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "golden_helmet", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_stained_glass", "quantity": 23, "index": 31}, {"type": "lime_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "cocoa_beans", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "wooden_pickaxe", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "pink_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 20, "index": 40}, {"type": "blue_concrete_powder", "quantity": 14, "index": 41}, {"type": "glass_bottle", "quantity": 5, "index": 42}, {"type": "cyan_concrete", "quantity": 7, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft brown_stained_glass_pane, I need to craft brown_dye first. To craft brown_dye, I need cocoa_beans, which are in slot 34. I will move them to the crafting grid, starting from slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: brown_stained_glass_pane

Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1
